name: rtmjobs.com
overview:
In association with Rail Technology Magazine, rtmjobs.com offers industry recruiters a unique opportunity to reach professionals in the rail sector no matter which function or level of candidate they are targeting. By using the very latest search engine optimisation technology provided by the UKâ€™s leading portals, rtmjobs.com makes it even easier for job seekers to find the latest rail vacancies in their market. And because rtmjobs.com is industry specific, it guarantees recruiters an efficient means of recruiting quickly and cost effectively.

rtmjobs.com offers a whole host of targeted services to assist you in finding the right candidates for your rail jobs making recruitment even easier than ever before, such as simple but effective job listings, intuitive candidate targeting and jobs by email, a fully searchable CV database and relevant candidates emailed directly to you as they register, as well as banner advertising across various prime locations on the site.

For further information on the variety of recruitment advertising packages available contact the team on 0161 833 6320 or follow the link to find out more and find the right candidate for your rail jobs today.
